column2: select yearId as year, playerId, sum (hr) as numHR from baseball.batting group by yearId, playerId) , hrs_ranked as (select year, playerId, numHr , rank () over (partition by year, playerId order by numHR desc) as rank from hrs) select hr.year, hr.numHr, p.nameFIrst, p.nameLast from hrs_ranked hr join baseball.players p on p.playerid = b.playerid where rank < =# order by # desc, # desc
